document.full_text: the taliban declared the start of a spring offensive across afghanistan on saturday, warning they would target foreign troops as well as afghan security forces and top government officials in a wave of attacks including suicide bombings.
document.title: afghan taliban declare start to spring offensive
lines_and_colors: the taliban declared the start of a spring offensive across afghanistan on saturday, warning they would target foreign troops as well as afghan security forces and top government officials in a wave of attacks including suicide bombings.
